the teeth you will have a hard time closing the zipper when you are finished with everything sew ~ ¼ inches away from the teeth have at least as many stitches as there are crochet stitches poliwag body same pattern as the pokeball sphere but only use blue yarn pokeball to poliwag reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin the body of poliwag will have the hinge stitches at the bottom where the feet will go the top of its head will have the zipper opening feet ovals use blue yarn round 1 8 single_crochet magic_ring with 8 single_crochet round 2-9 8 single_crochet add stuffing round 10 sew opening closed by threading tapestry needle though all 6 single_crochet outer legs leave a long tail for sewing to the body use tapestry needle to sew foot to body at row 13 of body and 3 stitches left/right of the start of the rounds of the body make enough stitches so the foot is secure and not to floppy attach at the back and halfway up leave the front of the foot free repeat for other foot tummy use white yarn round 1 6 single_crochet magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 round 4 2 single_crochet increase x 6 24 round 5 3 single_crochet the center use a tapestry needle to sew to the body put the center of the tummy shifted down from the center of the body with the center of the tummy at row 3 of the body put the start of the swirl near its right foot your left eyes use black yarn round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 increase x 6 12 switch to white yarn but leave a long tail of the black yarn to sew the black part of
